content: World has come so far that LinkedIn Pulse has become the talk of the town or at least within the world of professional bloggers. In my case, I’m still figuring out how to grow the basic audience base in my profile. Even though I see overall a different interface and a newly launched chat box that comes handy for swift conversation, I don’t see any changes in how I perceive it now, than I did earlier. More than it having to convince me and my quirky expectations, I think I’ll have to do away the strange and suffocating impression that I’ve upon LinkedIn. Good luck to me!
